name: Retale Lite
summary: Retale is out! Befriend coworkers or be eaten by them! Explore what its like to work in a store and find out what's going on in the company that's making everyone so sad! Serve customers and experiment with peoples feelings! Meet Ava, Spike, Asher and many more in a story that'll take you all the way from the interview to the till to the lives of everyday furries!
